directions: Combine cornstarch and milk with ricotta, remaining 1 cup milk, eggs, vanilla, and sugar.  Mix until well blended.  Pour filling into unbaked pie shell.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour, or until a knife inserted into center comes out clean.  Sprinkle top with cinnamon, and cool.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
title: Ricotta Cheese Pie I
